histore.archive.store.mem.writer module¶

Implementation of the archive writer for the in-memory archive.

class histore.archive.store.mem.writer.ArchiveBuffer(row_counter)¶

Bases: histore.archive.writer.ArchiveWriter

The archive buffer maintains a list of archive rows in memory.

write_archive_row(row)¶

Add the given row to the row buffer.

Parameters

row (histore.archive.row.ArchiveRow) – Row in a new version of a dataset archive.
